summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4140 for the improvement of 3rd Avenue North, from Ward Street to a point approximately one hundred (100) feet north of Prospect Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 49546, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
